name: @evcc/icons
description: A collection of evcc icons for vehicles, meters, and chargers. Core SVG registry with framework-specific packages available.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:registry
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && cd packages/react && npm run clean && cd ../vue && npm run clean && cd ../web && npm run clean
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run test:examples
scripts.build:packages: npm run build && npm run build:react && npm run build:vue && npm run build:web
scripts.build:packages:clean: npm run clean:all && npm run build:packages
scripts.build:react: cd packages/react && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:vue: cd packages/vue && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.build:web: cd packages/web && npm ci && npm run build
scripts.install:packages: cd packages/react && npm ci && cd ../vue && npm ci && cd ../web && npm ci
